archimate:Capability.name: Customer communication management
archimate:Capability.documentation: Customer communication management is a digital capability used to plan, implement, monitor and adjust how an organization communicates with customers to improve customized and personalized communications. At the core ar the functionalities to extract, compose, author, format, print, deliver, store, or retrieve communication messages such as letters, bills & invoices, statements, policies, quotations, proposals, contracts, manuals or customer correspondence as per customer's preffered and available communication options to better communicate with a customer or a segment of customers.
